text: The 1876 NYU Violets football team was an American football team that represented New York University in the 1876 college football season. The team played one game, losing to Stevens Institute of Technology by an 8–0 score. ==Schedule== ==References== NYU Category:NYU Violets football seasons Category:College football winless seasons NYU Violets football
title: 1876 NYU Violets football team
